Start by tapping the request button\n Select and enter in the required information\n Tap Request\n Done! Now, All the relevant tutors will be able to see your request.
Tap the navigation drawer in the upper left hand side\n Tap the Settings option\n Select My Subjects\n Initially, when you first sign up you will have no subjects. So you will need to Add your relevent subjects\n Tap the Add Subjects at the botttom of the screen\n Then finally add subjects to your account by tapping the Add buttion for that subject.\n Press the back button and swipe down to refresh and you should see your subjects.\n To remove a subject, just tap the remove button under its name.
Tap the navigation drawer in the upper left hand side\n Tap the Settings option\n Select My Account\n Now, you can set your profile picture by tapping the image button and selecting the image you desire from your gallery.\n To edit your profile, tap the Edit Profile button at the bottom of the screen.\n Note: You are only allowed to change your name, phone number and password.\n One you are done making changes, you MUST input your password and confirm it... as a safty measure\n Then tap update to save the changes, or cancel to revert back.\n
Tap the navigation drawer in the upper left hand side\n Tap the Settings option\n Select My Account\n Tap on Edit profile.\n Enter in and confirm your password\n Tap on Delete Account.\n Tap on yes.\n
Note: THIS ACTION CANNOT BE UNDONE!
